recipes.name: Rampetto
recipes.description: A flour tortilla rolled or folded around a marchetto.

recipes.name: Fruitcake
recipes.description: Fresh cake made with candied or dried fruit, nuts, and spices, and optionally soaked in spirits.

recipes.name: Tomato Pasta
recipes.description: Pasta al pomodoro is an Italian food typically prepared with pasta, olive oil, fresh tomatoes, basil, and various other fresh ingredients.
